basic.blooming: Flowering period July-August, fruiting period September-October
basic.color: Flower color red, fruit color brown

maintenance.size: Diameter ≥ 10 cm, height ≥ 20 cm, suitable for bonsai
maintenance.soil: Peat soil or loose sandy soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate sunshine, resistant to half shade, place in shade under strong light in summer
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, dead and diseased leaves timely
